text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Are you saying you're going to light up instead? …Just so you know, it's much harder than I thought.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I run up the outside stairs and react to the lights on. Now I can see the lights climbing to the top.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: However, since the stairs are split into two, we can't see each other…… In other words, we can't run up the stairs at the right time with our eyes.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: In other words, you have to move at a steady speed, in perfect synchrony.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Can you say for sure?

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: I can do it!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Is it possible for the two of you to trust us and leave it to us?

text_block_list.name: Event Manager
text_block_list.text: O-Of course! If you two say so…! I'm sorry to burden you, but I'm counting on you!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. …Didn't you hear? There's no time until the light-up ceremony. You guys warm up.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: And so, the two of them won't be able to attend the ceremony. Instead, we need to make room for them right now.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: What I'm thinking is that Brian and I are going to present the GIRLS LEGEND U――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Wait! Can I do that? I'll perform on stage! No, let me!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That's not a problem… Is it okay to be alone?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Both Airgrove and Brian should be on standby in case something happens, right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Don't worry. I think I'll be able to put on an amazing performance today. I'll sing with my precious feelings. …What do you think?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …If you want to satisfy the audience, I don't mind. Brian, what about you?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Do as you please.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'll do what I want. So…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Brian… Just watch. Just watch me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I'm off, then!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: ――Finally, the lighting ceremony begins after this! Before that……this time, we're going to perform one song as a surprise!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …What is she thinking?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You want to catch your breath, don't you? You seem to have lost your fangs recently, even from my perspective. …I can tell you're hurt.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Even so, Laurel will tell you… No, she'll know soon enough.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Don't take your eyes off me. It's the responsibility of those who become the symbol of their goal to face the resolve to face them.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (―I'm going to show everyone my feelings. And I'm going to show you…!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (There were so many things I had to give up on. My hopes for everyone, who withered without budding.)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (Still, I can't give up. I can't give up. I have to have you stay here. An absolute light――)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: 『――I want to win with you!』

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (Look at me, Brian. The last thing you see is my light.)

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: Sakura Laurel, thank you very much! Your voice was full of spirit and spirit!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Hmm? Looks like Laurel's feelings have reached you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Anyway, the real problem is after this. Vodka and Scarlet run up the stairs―

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …I'll run at my own pace. Okay?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hah, do that! I'll run like myself. That's how I've always been.

text_block_list.name: Event Manager
text_block_list.text: Vodka, Scarlet! Please stand by!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Okay, I'll go with tappen.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Laurel, good work. That was a good performance.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Thanks! So, what about Vodka and the others?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's about to start. I run up the stairs leading from the ground to the observation deck, and reproduce the lights―

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Brian, can you do it?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I don't train to match someone else's speed, and I can't see them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: But you think those two can do it, right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yeah! It's Vodka and Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: ――And so, about this lighting……what a surprise! The two Ambassadors will actually be lighting it!

text_block_list.name: Event Moderator
text_block_list.text: Everyone, please pay attention to Hallon Tower!
